Class ItemTest

java.lang.Object
com.example.softwaresolutionssquad.ItemTest
public class ItemTest extends Object
Tests for adding and editing inventory items in the MainActivity.

      Parameters:
      isFromEditTest - A flag indicating if the cleanup is called from the edit item test.
